name: Trayde
description: UK's online wholesale marketplace that connects independents brands with retailers.

team.name: Armen Karapetyan
team.bioHtml: Founder @Trayde â€¢ Worked at @Accenture

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
An exciting opportunity to join early-stage startup within retail / e-commerce space. At Trayde, we are digitising the wholesale process for thousands of small businesses around UK, helping niche brands and makers get their products discovered by independent shops and boutiques. 

We are looking for a marketing intern who will be integral part of the team and will take responsibility on driving our digital marketing efforts. You will have a great deal of independence with guidance from the CEO, as well as the opportunity to plan and execute your own ideas. 

**What you will be working on**
* Run social media channels
* Engage with our audience (both brands and retailers) to increase brand awareness and lead generation
* Develop content & creative for social media posts as well other content formats (e.g. how-to guides, infographics, etc)
* Help define overall marketing strategy

**You are**
* Enthusiastic, quick learner and proactive
* Come up with pragmatic solutions and then execute them, rather than worrying that things won't work
* Ideally have some experience in social media or marketing
* Are genuinely interested in impacting small and micro businesses all over UK.
* Want to develop your skills within an early-stage startup

*Please note: this is an unpaid position initially*
